description.narrative: 308/002 Populations build resilience and receive life & livelihood saving relief and recovery response to Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) emergencies in accordance with CCCs, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash â€“ General. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 308 Government, communities &civil societies in Disaster Risk Reduction (including timely life saving interventions during emergencies) respond to emergencies in Ethiopia by 2015, with particular focus on issues affecting women & children in the most vulnerable regions/districts.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 308/002 Populations build resilience and receive life & livelihood saving relief and recovery response to WASH emergencies inaccordance with CCCs

1: Percentage of emergency affected people provided with access to safe water supply through rehabilitation, maintenance, expansion from existing water scheme, new water supply establishment and water trucking as a last resort
2: 100% of emergency affected people reached with key hygiene messages
